name: French Design Philosophy
description: French design embodies sophistication, artistry, and the pursuit of beauty in everyday life.

principles.name: Savoir-Vivre
principles.description: The art of living well with grace and sophistication
principles.application: Refined details, quality materials, sophisticated arrangements

principles.name: Joie de Vivre
principles.description: Joy of living expressed through celebration and beauty
principles.application: Vibrant celebrations, artistic expressions, joyful gatherings

principles.name: L'Art de Recevoir
principles.description: The art of receiving and hosting with elegance
principles.application: Gracious hospitality, thoughtful details, memorable experiences

guidelines: Create spaces that celebrate beauty and sophistication
Pay attention to details and presentation
Balance formality with warmth and hospitality

inappropriate: Ignoring the importance of artistic expression
